summary: Changes beneficial potions to last 5 times as long but be half as potent.  Less potion micromanagement, without being unbalacing!  Does not conflict with any mods that edit potions.  Does not affect restoration potions or potions without magnitude.
descriptionHtml:
This changes beneficial potions to last 5 times as long but be half as potent.  It does not conflict with mods that edit potions.  It also does not affect restoration potions or potions that have no magnitude (invisibility, etc).

It applies retroactively to crafted and discovered potions alike.


[u]-Installation-[/u]
Place Eld-longerWeakerPotions.esp into your Data folder, and enable it using your preferred mod manager.

[u]-Uninstalling-[/u]
Remove Eld-longerWeakerPotions.esp from your Data folder.  All potions will return to their normal durations and magnitudes.

[u]-Modder Info-[/u]
This mod edits the AlchemySkillBoosts perk only.

[u]-Credits-[/u]
Thanks to Dave Humphrey for SkyEdit.
author: Eldiran
